short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives additional functionality to Medallia DXA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decibel extension provides additional functionality for Decibel reporting application. It is required to view advanced heatmap and visitor replay functionality.
